SEARCH

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
MainController
public class MainController extends Object
The MainController class is responsible for controlling the main functionality of the application. It handles user interactions with the view and updates the model accordingly.

    • yesNoOption

      public int yesNoOption(String message, String title)
      Displays a dialog box with a yes/no option and returns the user's choice.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display in the dialog box
      title - the title of the dialog box
      Returns:
      an integer representing the user's choice: - JOptionPane.YES_OPTION if the user selects "Yes" - JOptionPane.NO_OPTION if the user selects "No" - JOptionPane.CLOSED_OPTION if the user closes the dialog box
